title: Dear Riot: You're doing great
body:
First off, I'd like to open this with one thing: Fiora
So much hate goes towards this champion right now. So much. I'm not sure if it's because people suck at her, or because people just flat out think she's bad. That, I do not know. What I do know is? I love her. I think she's in a great spot. Her kit is in a great area where she can poke the living crap out of her lane opponent, and survive ganks if she can play her w right. She's got tons of counter play, but also a fantastic-ly high skill cap.

However, I have noticed many people being thoroughly disappointed, and whining their asses off because riot took away their untargetable, counterless ultimate, which most of the lol community hates. I'd like to note that, honestly?
You're doing great. The champion you designed? Fantastic.

All of what you, as a company, have done, is great. 
You've built this wonderful game that I can call home, regardless of how mad or happy it may make me, it's home. 
It holds a community. A fantastic community that, despite the negative aspects of it, I wouldn't trade for all the precious metals in the world.
Now as much as a community may rage at you, as much as they may hate you, I wanna say that you, as a company, have done something astounding, being that you've created the most popular game in the world, and continue to provide it with ever-greater content that thoroughly shines bright. 
I wanna say not to ever take what the community says in a negative way, and that above all you should always recognize that some of us here still love what others may hate.
What some may think is 'too hard', or 'impossible', the truly skilled players may also think of as too easy. 

This game is a great game I absorb myself in. 
I guess what I'm trying to say is, keep doing you, boo. :)
